website_summaries.verdict: Just like its name, Feminine, sporty and great for everyday wear.
pros: Awarded APMA Seal of Acceptance for promoting good foot health
Comes in All Black, Black 1, Black-Metallic Bronze, Charcoal-Dusty Grey, Deep Plum, Plum Jam, Metallic Gold-Urban White, Midnight Navy, Neon Blush-Urban White
Breathable nylon knitted upper, round toe
Flexible, slip-resistant outsole with rubber pod outsole
cons: Don't work well with no-show socks

customer_reviews.title: The pain from my plantar fasciitis is a thing of the past!
customer_reviews.text: I love fit flop's flip flops (say that 5 times fast!) and I've always wanted their sneakers. When my most recent pair of shoes wore out I decided to order these and I am not dissapointed. I love that the laces aren't real and they easily slip on my feet. They also keep my feet mostly dry even in wetter weather. The soles of the shoes help with my plantar fasciitis and I have no foot pain while wearing these, they are absolutely wonderful!! Thank you for making cute orthopedic shoes Fit Flop, my feet thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Love. love
customer_reviews.text: Love.love.love these sneakers. They feel just like fitflop sandals. I love fitflop but have bunions so wasn’t sure id the closed shoe would fit since I usually need a wider width shoe. They have stretch so they fit perfectly. This feels like it could be a wide width shoe even though it’s B width. I highly recmmend
customer_reviews.author: Ophelia

customer_reviews.title: Not Enough Support
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many FitFlops over the years and all have been comfortable so i expected these sneakers to be the same. Turns out they’re too flat, no arch support causing my knees and low back to hurt. And the ball of my foot hurts after a few hours in them. I had to usr Dr schools insert w these for a little added support. None of my other fitflops have i had to rely on additional padding Highly Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So dang comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Omg omg omg. I just put these shoes on. I ordered them thinking I don't really need shoes. I put them on. I NEED THEM. These shoes are soooo comfortable. My teen daughter loves the look and wants her own pair.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: In my new job, I can dress casually and tried these in recommendation from a friend. They look nice and are very comfy. They have laces but that is just fashion. They slip on. I wear an 8 Medium. They seems a tad wide. Overall I am very happy with them. And it saves my nicer shoes. Good product and well priced. Hope they make more colors. Definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Too wide for most
customer_reviews.text: These are too wide for my medium width feet. Better for wide width feet. Returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great heel support.
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. Size 8.5 where normally wear 8.5 to 9. 8.5 has plenty of room. Feels really good on my heel that gets sore.
customer_reviews.author: S. mills

customer_reviews.title: Great for working!
customer_reviews.text: Feels great on my feet! Ran a little large - had to get a half size smaller. But very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: NanaT

customer_reviews.title: Fitflops are the most comfortable shoes you can own.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing I dislike about this shoe. I recommend Fitflops to everyone I know!
customer_reviews.author: cheryl daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. If looking for arch support this is not the right shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Mk

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable shoes. I would buy them again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: They sent me the wrong size should have been a size 5
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed to receive the wrong size. Its a great shoe and I had planned to wear to a function
customer_reviews.author: JJ Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: The support of the FitFlop Women's F-Sporty Uberknit Sneakers Low-Top
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and feel of these shoes. They are light on my feet and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: kgalle

customer_reviews.title: Feet Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: From one who can't wear any heeled shoe, I can wear their sandals all day with no discomfort/pain. Took a chance on the tennis-type shoe (white sparkly style) and found them to be just as comfortable, so I bought this black "heather" color. Only issue is that they're sweater-like knit. They get dirty easy and are difficult/fussy to clean - and expensive. But, more stylish than regular sport shoes. Great with leggings!
customer_reviews.author: delru

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sneaker . Bought this for my ten year old and she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Bjsmom19

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I got the blush color, and they go with everything. Very cute. I have a pair of Fit Flop sandals and I wanted something for traveling around Greece for three weeks. I did tons of walking in these, and they were great. No break-in period. I do wear them with thin "footsie" socks. They are also wonderful for the plane as they are stretchy and when your feet get swollen on the flight, they accommodate. So glad I bought these!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for all applications.
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe. I have 2 pairs and hope to get a replacement. Just fyi, I have taken out inserts and washed shoes and inserts in my front loading washer. I have also replay ace innersoles with some that came with my walking shoes, as needed. It seems as though these are no longer being made so fans should snatch up quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Belzer

product_meta.title: FitFlop Women's F-Sporty Uberknit Sneakers
product_meta.description: Take the weight off your feet…literally. FitFlop’s bestselling F-Sporty sneakers have been reworked into a slip-straight-on, superstreamlined version boasting a totally knitted, light-as-a-feather, one-single-piece upper. Über-soft, stretchy, breathable, with FitFlop’s ultra-light, full-flex Anatomicush™ midsoles underneath for mindblowing comfort. Truly the light fantastic.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
On FitFlop's superlight, ultra-flexible Anatomicush midsole technology for all-day comfort
Ergonomically engineered, ultra-comfortable slip-on knit sneakers
Ultra-light, stretchy, breathable, single-piece nylon-mix knit uppers
Mesh-lined footbed, with antibacterial treatment to help prevent odor, seamless built-in arch contour
